valueString.value: define "IsBedLocation": Location.physicalType ~ "Bed"
define "Encounters": [Encounter]
define "EncounterCheck": exists("Encounters" Encounters where Encounters.period overlaps "Measurement Period")
define "LocationIsHOSP": exists( Location.type types where types ~ "HOSP" )
define "LocationIsOTH": exists( Location.type types where types ~ "OTH" )
Burn Beds Initial Population
define "Burn Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsOTH
define "LocationIsIRF": exists( Location.type types where types ~ "IRF" )
NICU Beds Initial Population
define "NICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and LocationIsOTH
Surge Active ICU Beds Initial Population
define "Surge Active ICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsOTH
define "LocationIsIPF": exists( Location.type types where types ~ "IPF" )
define "LocationIsCHLD": exists( Location.type types where types ~ "CHLD" )
define "LocationIsPEDS": exists( Location.type types where types ~ "PEDS" )
Peds Psych Beds Initial Population
define "Peds Psych Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIPF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Specialty Beds Initial Population
define "Specialty Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsOTH
Surge Active Total Beds Initial Population
define "Surge Active Total Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Peds ED Initial Population

define "Peds ED Initial Population": IsBedLocation and exists( [Encounter: "Emergency Department Visit"] EDVisit where EDVisit.period overlaps "Measurement Period" ) and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
Adult ICU Beds Initial Population
define "Adult ICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP
Adult MTMS Beds Initial Population
define "Adult MTMS Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and LocationIsOTH
NICU4 Beds Initial Population
define "NICU4 Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and LocationIsOTH
Rehab Beds Initial Population
define "Rehab Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsIRF
Adult NonICU Beds Initial Population
define "Adult NonICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsOTH
Surge Inactive ICU Beds Initial Population
define "Surge Inactive ICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsOTH
Adult Obs Beds Initial Population
define "Adult Obs Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsOTH
Surge Inactive NonICU Beds Initial Population
define "Surge Inactive NonICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
Peds Total Beds Initial Population
define "Peds Total Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
Peds MTMS Beds Initial Population
define "Peds MTMS Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Adult ED Initial Population

define "Adult ED Initial Population": IsBedLocation and exists( [Encounter: "Emergency Department Visit"] EDVisit where EDVisit.period overlaps "Measurement Period" ) and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsOTH
Surge Inactive Total Beds Initial Population
define "Surge Inactive Total Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Negative Pressure Beds Initial Population
define "Negative Pressure Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP
Peds Obs Beds Initial Population
define "Peds Obs Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Bed Capacity Initial Population
define "Bed Capacity Initial Population": IsBedLocation
NICU1 Beds Initial Population
define "NICU1 Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Peds ICULOC Beds Initial Population
define "Peds ICULOC Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Total ED Initial Population

define "Total ED Initial Population": IsBedLocation and exists( [Encounter: "Emergency Department Visit"] EDVisit where EDVisit.period overlaps "Measurement Period" ) and LocationIsHOSP and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
All Beds Initial Population
define "All Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck
Adult Beds Initial Population
define "Adult Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and LocationIsIPF
NICU2 Beds Initial Population
define "NICU2 Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
Nursery Beds Initial Population
define "Nursery Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
Adult PCU Beds Initial Population
define "Adult PCU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsIPF and LocationIsOTH
Peds PCU Beds Initial Population
define "Peds PCU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Peds ICU Beds Initial Population
define "Peds ICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
Adult Psych Beds Initial Population
define "Adult Psych Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIPF and LocationIsOTH
Specialty NonCrib Beds Initial Population
define "Specialty NonCrib Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and LocationIsOTH
Adult ICULOC Beds Initial Population
define "Adult ICULOC Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIPF
NICU3Plus Beds Initial Population
define "NICU3Plus Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
Peds NonICU Beds Initial Population
define "Peds NonICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsIPF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
Surge Active NonICU Beds Initial Population
define "Surge Active NonICU Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
OB Beds Initial Population
define "OB Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS) and LocationIsOTH
NICU3 Beds Initial Population
define "NICU3 Beds Initial Population": IsBedLocation and EncounterCheck and LocationIsHOSP and LocationIsIRF and (LocationIsCHLD or LocationIsPEDS)
define function ToConcept(concept FHIR.CodeableConcept): if concept is null then null else System.Concept { codes: concept.coding C return ToCode(C), display: concept.text.value }

define function ToCode(coding FHIR.Coding): if coding is null then null else System.Code { code: coding.code.value, system: coding.system.value, version: coding.version.value, display: coding.display.value }

define function ToInterval(period FHIR.Period): if period is null then null else if period."start" is null then Interval(period."start".value, period."end".value] else Interval[period."start".value, period."end".value]
